cwitools.modeling.moffat1d¶

cwitools.modeling.moffat1d(params, x)¶

Simple wrapper for a one-dimensional Moffat profile.

Args:

params (list): 1D Moffat parameters (amplitude, mean, alpha, gamma) x (numpy.array): The input on which to evaluate the model

Returns:

numpy.array: The Moffat model output
